SEARCH
Module com.therealworld.fitschedule
Package com.therealworld.fitschedule.model

Class Goal

java.lang.Object
com.therealworld.fitschedule.model.Goal
public class Goal extends Object
The Goal class represents a user-defined goal with specific parameters such as type, duration, period, and description. It tracks the goal's completion status and progress over time. This class provides getters and setters for each property, enabling easy management and updating of goals within the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Goal

      public Goal(int goalId, String goalType, int goalDuration, String goalPeriod, String goalDescription, boolean goalCompleted, int goalProgress)
      Constructs a new Goal with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      goalId - The unique ID of the goal.
      goalType - The type or category of the goal.
      goalDuration - The target duration or quantity to achieve the goal.
      goalPeriod - The period for the goal's tracking, such as daily or weekly.
      goalDescription - A description of the goal.
      goalCompleted - True if the goal has been completed, false otherwise.
      goalProgress - Current progress made towards the goal.
